Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I'm playing KSP (0.21) ainda I made a ship to go all the way to the mun, drop two landers e come back (Yes, cheating with unlimited fuel). The first flight went nice, i tested the config off the ship and everything worked nicelly (in low Kerbin orbit - 150km)..

Even though it worked nicelly I made some tweaks to shead some weigh..now i have a problem.

I activate the Ascent Guidence, select the same orbit (150km) and everything goes smooth until the final "push"...when it decelerates the engine to do the final 0. something meters per second the target stars to move around the artificial horizon and Mechjeb start's to move the ship to the new target position..obviously it goes mad because the target doesn't stop moving..and i can't stabilize the orbit...

Does anyone know why it does that?

Thanks from Portugal!

Edited February 27, 2014 by Chipelo

Sorry for the double post, but i've fixed it..

I just changed the precision from 0.1m/s to 0.5m/s and so far it's working.
